projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

components.name: Tizen
components.description: HTML5 os for phones tablets, IVI

fields.description:
Description:
1. In the cli execute 'ti create module'
2. Notice the options you get for the platforms

Actual Results:
1. We see 'Tizen' as a platform option even though modules for tizen are not supported as of now
2. NOTE : going ahead & creating the module for tizen gives us a default two tabbed app

Expected result:
1. There should be no tizen platform option in the 'ti create module' command & it is not supported as of today i.e 4/16/13
fields.summary: CLI : Tizen option exists in 'ti create module' command even though its not supported as of now i.e 4/16/13
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.1.201304122013
Ti SDK : 3.2.0.v20130412191647
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 
Win 8

comments.body: We will be deferring work on Tizen for the moment.

NO option exists for Tizen.
Tested running
{code}
ti create -t module
{code}

Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201405011408
